citation: Proclamation under the Roads and Jetties Act 1935 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Roads and Jetties Act 1935

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 7 of the Roads and Jetties Act 1935 â€“

        (a) declare the portions of road specified in Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be a subsidiary road, classified as a tourist road, for the purposes of Part II of that Act;
        (b) amend the proclamation notified in the Gazette as Statutory Rules 1970, No. 67, by inserting in Part III of the Second Schedule to that proclamation, in the correct alphabetical position, the following item:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    5.48             
        Binalong Bay  From its junction with the Tasman Highway in St Helens to a point 108 metres south of the centre of the junction of Cray Court with Binalong Bay Road and Main Road at Binalong Bay, via Quail Street and Binalong Bay Road.                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (8.82 kilometres)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
        
            (c) declare that this proclamation takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.
    11 October 2021

    B. BAKER

    Governor

    By Her Excellency's Command,

    MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

    Minister for Infrastructure and Transport

    SCHEDULE 1 - Portions of Roads declared to be a Subsidiary Road

      Road  Extent  Length in kilometres  1.  Quail Street  From its intersection with Cecilia Street, St Helens, to its intersection with Binalong Bay Road, St Helens  0.453  2.  Binalong Bay Road  From its intersection with Quail Street, St Helens, to a point 108 metres south of its intersection with Cray Court and Main Road, Binalong Bay  8.367
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    

    Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

    Notified in the Gazette on 20 October 2021

    This proclamation is administered in the Department of State Growth.
